name: The Herbal Spice Problem
description:
Oh no! You've been stranded on an alien planet and you're dying for a cup of tea... Explore the terrain in search of plants to brew into tea - but watch out! Most of them are poisonous.

Initial game concept, music and SFX are all by https://fluffy.itch.io and the music is available at https://music.sockpuppet.us/album/herbal-spice-problem-ost
